"Pursue the Fleeing Pajhadu-lin!": "Derrota Pajhadu-lin!"
"Pajhadu-lin have appeared in the area, but their movements are... odd. Everyone should move to intercept them, but Ten cuidado."
"Estan obteniendo energia de esa aura...? Son aquellas linternas siendo afectados por miasmas? Todos los ARKS, ataque y purificar esas linternas!"
"The Pajhadu-lin have been stopped. If there are any corrupted lanterns left, you should purify them now."
"... It appears our strategy failed. Nonetheless, you should seek and purify any lanterns that are still corrupted."
"The skies are getting even darker. Attack the corrupted lanterns posthaste, lest you find yourselves at a disadvantage."
"Be mindful of the miasma. If you walk around in it, it will hurt. Chase the Pajhadu-lin from the rooftops instead!"
"This is bad. The hostiles in the miasma have started to recover. Purify the lanterns posthaste!"
"Good, keep purifying the lanterns, just like that. The skies are starting to brighten. Just don't get careless."
"Looks like all the lanterns have been purified. Now's the time to round up all those Pajhadu-lin."
"Good job. You should purify any other lanterns you find like this too."
"The lanterns have been infected by the Pajhadu-lin's miasma. Hurry and clean it up, or the damage will only get worse!"
"We have a lock on a Pajhadu-lin. Make haste to $(0) and take it out immediately."
